tool_description: Local weather reports are not accurate enough for climbing mountains. Get weather forecasts for the summit of over 10,000 mountains around the world.
name: Peak Conditions
title: Peak Conditions

api_list.name: get extended report by mountain id
api_list.description: Returns an extended 6-day report for the mountain peak specified in the request.

api_list.name: get daily report by mountain id
api_list.description: Returns a daily report for the mountain peak specified in the request.

required_parameters.name: mountainId
required_parameters.description: The id number associated with a mountain peak.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://peak-conditions.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/rapid/report/daily/18499"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "peak-conditions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://peak-conditions.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/rapid/report/daily/{mountainid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "peak-conditions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: search mountain peak by name
api_list.description: search for mountain peaks by name. returns all mountains with names containing the search query, along with their associated peak_id.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query - enter the name of the mountain peak you wish to search for. spaces can be represented by the '+' character.
